bibl.title: Production and Public Powers in Classical Antiquity. (Cambridge Philological Society. Suppl. 26.)
bibl.note: 12 papers originally prepared for and presented at the B1 session on 'Production and public powers in Antiquity' of the Eleventh International Economic History Congress held at Milan in September 1994. - Pp. 1-4: Elio LO CASCIO and Dominic W. RATHBONE, Introduction.
